name: Offiga/ Snapmojo
description: We are Offiga - pioneers of employee engagement and gift rewards programs for the world’s leading organizations. We started out in 2019 with our retail brand SnapMojo to personalize the way gifting works. We grew rapidly with over 600% revenue growth since our first year and over 30,000+ happy customers. In 2021, we realized that the enterprise gift rewards landscape was broken. Thus, we built Offiga to support enterprise teams that believe deep human connection can create game-changing business results. Fast forward to today and we are one of the fastest growing companies in this space with a client list that includes the likes of Bain & Co., Philips, Gartner, EXL, S&P Global and many more! Our journey has just begun and we are excited for you to be a part of it!
Headline: We have mastered gifting, so you don't have to!
ShortDescription: At Offiga, we power tech-driven enterprise gifting for the world’s leading companies such as Bain & Co., McKinsey, Philips, Gartner, EXL, S&P Global, Times of India and many more! We make it easy to set up and scale your gift rewards for employees and clients with first-in-class offerings such as gifting automation, gifting dashboard and employee lifecycle gifting.
enhanced_description: Offiga, evolving from its 2019 retail brand SnapMojo, was established in 2021 to revolutionize the enterprise gift rewards landscape. As a pioneer in employee engagement and gift rewards programs, Offiga powers tech-driven enterprise gifting for leading global organizations. The platform offers first-in-class features such as gifting automation, a comprehensive gifting dashboard, and employee lifecycle gifting, making it easy to set up and scale gift rewards for both employees and clients. Offiga's client roster includes prominent names like Bain & Co., McKinsey, Philips, Gartner, EXL, S&P Global, and Times of India, showcasing its commitment to improving employee happiness and engagement through deep human connections.
